channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crypto regulation bills move forward after record-setting House vote
item.description: The second attempt to advance a pair of crypto bills came after President Donald Trump intervened Tuesday evening to get the holdouts on board.

item.title: Using ChatGPT for stock-market advice? Here’s how Wall Street pros do it.
EU proposes raising defense funding in 2-trillion-euro budget
item.description: "This is a budget for the realities of today, as well as the challenges of tomorrow," European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said.

item.title: Currency trading firm Argentex halts operations
What happens if Trump fires Fed Chair Powell: 'This would be a mess,' analysts warn
item.description: Former Deputy Treasury Secretary Roger Altman said he did not think Jerome Powell would agree to leave if the president asked him to.

item.title: Taiwan Semi shares rise 4% in premarket after company lifts sales view
Fed’s Williams says tariffs are pushing up inflation, expects even higher prices
PepsiCo reports surprise rise in revenue
Trump lashes out at Republicans over Jeffrey Epstein file demands
item.description: Democrats have leaned into the rift emerging within Trump's political base over Jeffrey Epstein. The president has repeatedly urged his supporters to ...

item.title: Shares of gun seller GrabAGun — backed by Donald Trump Jr. — tank after NYSE trading debut
item.description: The business is the latest example of President Donald Trump's family and allies backing companies related to conservative political causes.
